A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
THE LAST JEDI REVIEW

Few times does a movie not only meet my expectations but surpass them so far that no one even remembers what my previous positive expectations even looked like!!

It was everything I could have dreamed with the interactions between Rey and Kylo Ren.

Poe had some character development I never expected\, I loved the direction they took with him\, he was so awesome and so passionate!!!

Finn and Rose were super cute and funny. Finn learned a lot through his adventures with her and had a lot of great character development. 

I absolutely loved Leia's arc and her flying scene. I wanted to cry.

Luke was awesome. I was ready to be disappointed by how they were handling his super whiney big Skywalker boy-ness\, but in the end I wasn't. It made so much sense for him. And he made up for everything in the end by being himself\, and being amazing.

Rey was super amazing and I love her!!!!!

Kylo Ren became more powerful and imposing and scary\, and I always wanted to see that.

The battle scenes and story had a lot of unique elements I have never seen before. It was exciting\, I was on the edge of my seat!

There was so much childish humour\, I loved how it didn't take itself too seriously. I laughed a lot.

What an EXCELLENT MOVIE!!! Go see it if you honestly just want some quality entertainment!!!!
